item.title: When the April Fool's Day Prank is Real
item.description: What happens when a company calls their own bluffs so much that it's not a joke anymore?

item.title: From Google to Apple
item.description: A living document describing my journey out of the deep Google ecosystem and into the deep Apple ecosystem.

item.title: Anonymously Autistic
item.description: You almost certainly know someone with autism who's good at hiding it. Why?

item.title: Tattoos as Moral Contracts
item.description: One expected and one unexpected way a tattoo can keep you in check with your ethics.

item.title: The Remote Pop-In
item.description: A method of dealing with one of the missing features of fully remote teams: the pop-in.
